title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the alias name of the columns should be displayed instead of the original column name.
EB: Currently, when selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the original column names are displayed below, while the alias names are displayed above as row['column1'], for example, when double-clicking the original column name.
SR:
Bug 118780: When setting aliases for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset. To reproduce: 
1. Create a new data source and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset, for example, 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item that is bound to the dataset.
4. Select the dataset in the expression builder and observe the display of column names.
